quotes.text: We loved with a love that was more than love.

quotes.text: I have found the one whom my soul loves.

quotes.text: Love is the magician that pulls man out of his own hat.

quotes.text: The first duty of love is to listen.

quotes.text: Love is a game that two can play and both win.

quotes.text: I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.

quotes.text: I am who I am because of you.

quotes.text: Love is when the other person’s happiness is more important than your own.

quotes.text: Love doesn’t just sit there, like a stone, it has to be made, like bread; remade all the time, made new.

quotes.text: We accept the love we think we deserve.

quotes.text: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.

quotes.text: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.

quotes.text: Love is all we have, the only way that each can help the other.

quotes.text: At the touch of love, everyone becomes a poet.

quotes.text: True love stories never have endings.
